005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.JsonUtil;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import org.json.JSONObject;
012import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
013
014import java.io.IOException;
015import java.io.InputStream;
016import java.net.URI;
017import java.net.URISyntaxException;
018import java.net.URL;
019import java.nio.file.Files;
020import java.nio.file.Path;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import javax.xml.transform.Source;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * A common interface for validation of Metaschema module-based content.
029 */
030public interface IContentValidator {
031  /**
032   * Validate the resource at provided {@code path}.
033   *
034   * @param path
035   *          the resource to validate
036   * @return the result of the validation
037   * @throws IOException
038   *           if an error occurred while performing validation
039   */
040  @NonNull
041  default IValidationResult validate(@NonNull Path path) throws IOException {
042    try (InputStream is = ObjectUtils.notNull(Files.newInputStream(path))) {
043      return validate(is, ObjectUtils.notNull(path.toUri()));
044    }
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Validate the resource at the provided {@code url}.
049   *
050   * @param url
051   *          the resource to validate
052   * @return the result of the validation
053   * @throws IOException
054   *           if an error occurred while performing validation
055   * @throws URISyntaxException
056   *           if there is a problem with the provided {@code url}
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  default IValidationResult validate(@NonNull URL url) throws IOException, URISyntaxException {
060    return validate(ObjectUtils.notNull(url.toURI()));
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Validate the resource identified by the provided {@code uri}.
065   *
066   * @param uri
067   *          the resource to validate
068   * @return the result of the validation
069   * @throws IOException
070   *           if an error occurred while performing validation
071   */
072  @NonNull
073  IValidationResult validate(@NonNull URI uri) throws IOException;
074
075  /**
076   * Validate the resource associated with the provided input stream {@code is}.
077   *
078   * @param is
079   *          an input stream to access the resource
080   * @param documentUri
081   *          the URI of the resource to validate
082   * @return the result of the validation
083   * @throws IOException
084   *           if an error occurred while performing validation
085   */
086  @NonNull
087  IValidationResult validate(@NonNull InputStream is, @NonNull URI documentUri) throws IOException;
088
089  /**
090   * Validate the target using the provided XML schemas.
091   *
092   * @param target
093   *          the target to validate
094   * @param schemaSources
095   *          the XML schema sources to validate with
096   * @return the validation result
097   * @throws IOException
098   *           if an error occurred while performing validation
099   * @throws SAXException
100   *           if an error occurred while parsing the XML target or schema
101   */
102  @NonNull
103  static IValidationResult validateWithXmlSchema(@NonNull URI target, @NonNull List<Source> schemaSources)
104      throws IOException, SAXException {
105    return new XmlSchemaContentValidator(schemaSources).validate(target);
106  }
107
108  /**
109   * Validate the target using the provided JSON schema.
110   *
111   * @param target
112   *          the target to validate
113   * @param schema
114   *          the JSON schema to validate with
115   * @return the validation result
116   * @throws IOException
117   *           if an error occurred while performing validation
118   * @see JsonUtil#toJsonObject(InputStream)
119   * @see JsonUtil#toJsonObject(java.io.Reader)
120   */
121  @NonNull
122  static IValidationResult validateWithJsonSchema(@NonNull URI target, @NonNull JSONObject schema)
123      throws IOException {
124    return new JsonSchemaContentValidator(schema).validate(target);
125  }
126}
